thread.title: VERBATIM: Bannon says wear racism badge 'with honor'

title: VERBATIM: Bannon says wear racism badge 'with honor'
text:
VERBATIM: Bannon says wear racism badge 'with honor' 12:13am IST - 00:41 
The former Trump adviser Steve Bannon tells the French far-right Front National to wear the racism label, given by the 'globalists,' with honor. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
